nodes.text: A mission was undertaken sometime after the Battle of Crait by Supreme Leader Kylo Ren from the First Order to gain access to the long-abandoned Jedi Temple's deepest level on the planet Coruscant. While on Coruscant, now covered with ash and desolated in contrast to its status during the era of the Galactic Republic, after landing his shuttle, the Master of the Knights of Ren faced giant wolves with his lightsaber at the steps of the Jedi Temple, before making his way into the temple's central elevator.

The mission to Coruscant was to be featured in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker, the third and final installment of the Star Wars sequel trilogy. Concept art for the mission was featured in the 2020 art book The Art of Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker, which states the mission was present in a draft dated back to early November 2017. In the final film, Coruscant's role in the story was filled by the Sith planet Exegol.
